thread.title: Exclusive Interview: Shahid Kapoor & Alia Bhatt for 'Shaandaar'
thread.title_full: Exclusive Interview: Shahid Kapoor & Alia Bhatt for 'Shaandaar' - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Exclusive Interview: Shahid Kapoor & Alia Bhatt for 'Shaandaar'
text: New Delhi, Oct 17 (ANI): Bollywood Actors Shahid Kapoor & Alia Bhatt in a candid chat with ANI spoke about their upcoming romantic comedy Shaandaar, their experience while working in the film,their favourite song, Diwali plans and a lot more. Directed by Vikas Bahl and produced by Anurag Kashyap and Vikramaditya Motwane the film is slated for a 22 October release. »
